Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 22, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 No frills, no bullshit, no information. Just a few doses of mouth breathing hardcore to drink beer and smash shit to. Might I suggest the smashing start with your expectations, and then move on to your hopes? WRENCH
